text: We Three Debutantes () is a 1953 Swedish drama film directed by Hasse Ekman. ==Cast== *Maj-Britt Nilsson as Lo Stjärnholm *Sven-Eric Gamble as Ludvig Lans *Per Oscarsson as Lillebror Brummer *Karl Gerhard as Karl Gerhard *Olof Winnerstrand as Publisher *Gunnel Broström as Secretary *Gunnar Björnstrand as Director Brummer *Åke Grönberg as Swedish John *Claes Thelander as Young Publisher *Douglas Håge as Frisk ==References== ==External links== * Category:1953 films Category:Films directed by Hasse Ekman Category:Swedish films Category:Swedish-language films
title: We Three Debutantes
